files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.CharacterCreator.CCMBase
files.Summary: Base class for all classes part of the Character Creator Menu

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.CharacterCreator.CCMHistoryTracker
files.Summary: Tracks all modifications made to the in the Character Creator.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterDraft
files.Summary: Wrapper class used when editting characters in the Character Creation Menu

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterDraft_NewCharacter
files.Summary: Wrapper for a newely created character within the Character Creation Menu. Added to a group when saved.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterDraft_PreExistingCharacter
files.Summary: Wrapper for a pre created character when being edited in the Character Creation Menu. A copy of the character is provided and edited in the menu. Changes to the copy will be applied to the original when saved.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterGroupRegistry
files.Summary: Holds a collection of three different types of groups. An instance of this class is used for each Layered Character Type.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterLayer
files.Summary: Represents a single layer of a character within a . Wraps a .

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterLayerOption.EquippedCharacterLayerOption_DTO
files.Summary: Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to save and load a .

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterTemplateBaseSO<TCharacterType, TCharacter>
files.Summary: Base class for all Character Templates.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.CharacterTypeBaseSO
files.Summary: bass Scriptable Object for all Character Types.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.LayeredCharacter
files.Summary: Represents a character made of multiple modular layers, such as body, outfit, hairstyle, etc. Each layer can be placed on top of each other in order to create the final character.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.LayeredCharacterGroupTemplateSO
files.Summary: A blueprint for a Layered Character Group (Fixed or Flexible) that will automatically be created at runtime.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.LayeredCharacterSnapshot
files.Summary: A snapshot of a character that can later be applied to the same character or another of the same .

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Characters.UnifiedCharacter
files.Summary: Represents a character built from a single, unified spritesheet containg all animations of the character.

files.Title: BlazerTech.CharacterManagement.Core.IValidatable
files.Summary:
Defines a contract for classes that can be validated.
Implementations expose a validation state via and provide a method to trigger or refresh that validation state.
